nodes.bodyText: I think a better name is iterateOutwardsManhattan, which makes it very clear what it does.

nodes.bodyText: move can be understood as moving to the given possition. offset or shift would be clearer.

        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			ARG 1 x
          
          
            
            			ARG 2 y
          
          
            
            			ARG 3 z
          
          
            
            			ARG 1 dx
          
          
            
            			ARG 2 dy
          
          
            
            			ARG 3 dz
